tasks.test:unit: deno test tests/cli tests/providers tests/config_test.ts tests/core_test.ts tests/utils_test.ts --allow-read --allow-env
tasks.test:coverage: MOCK_SERVER_URL="http://127.0.0.1:8086" bash -lc "find tests -name '*.ts' | grep -v '^tests/integration/' | xargs -r deno test --coverage=coverage --allow-run --allow-net=127.0.0.1:8086 --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write && deno coverage --lcov coverage > coverage/lcov.info"
